item.name: Assets management - basic maintenance to be provided
Procurement - compliance with regulations and guidelines
Procurement platform to improve practices in centralised contracts
Civil cases to be handled in proper way by Basic Courts
Property Tax Information System to be corrected
Waste collection fees
Health to have improved IT system
Air quality - legal framework to be added
Public debt to be managed properly
Liabilities - information and cooperation between state institutions
Uncollected debts
Budgetary planning of revenues
Creation of Internal Audit function
Risk management by Government and state institutions
Foreign Service - systematisation of diplomatic representations
Managing staff responsible for diaspora relations
Finance of the Institutions of Culture to be better managed
State owned enterprises - situation to be reviewed
State owned enterprises - work licences to be reviewed
Action Plan by Government
Review by Assembly
Municipal Assemblies to discuss and report
